entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, unable to speak due to his tongue being glued to the roof of his mouth. He is described as making obscene gestures and using magic to restrain Kreacher.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who appreciates Harry's actions and helps him restrain Kreacher.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is being restrained by Harry and Ron. He is described as a free house-elf who can obey anyone he likes.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: A house-elf who is being restrained by Harry. He is described as wizened and old.

relationships.description: Harry uses magic to restrain Kreacher, preventing them from fighting each other.
Harry releases Dobby from his restraint, allowing him to fall to the floor.
Ron releases Dobby from his restraint, allowing him to fall to the floor.
Dobby states that he will obey Harry's orders.
Kreacher is being restrained by Harry, preventing them from fighting each other.
